snippet.title: Stormhill Mystery: Family Shadows Trailer
snippet.description:
Stormhill Mystery: Family Shadows is a fantastic casual puzzle adventure game which, despite having some classic casual elements, will also offer a greater challenge for more experienced adventure games players. This is an excellent family story with a paranormal twist!
 
  One of my father’s stories was my favorite:
“Once upon a time there lived a merchant with his wife. The family was happy and had never known grief. However, their maid, Julianne, was jealous of the little family's happiness and secretly dreamed of taking the place of a beloved wife. She learned of unholy powers hidden deep within the manor that could be summoned by a ritual … although there was a cost. She cursed the merchant's wife, unleashed deadly powers.
Mother jumps from the cliff into the abyss of the sea...
The merchant vows to devote the rest of his life to finding a way to release his beloved wife from her cursed world.”
  Years have passed. My father dies, but he leaves me a message:
“Your favorite fairy tale was the true story of our family. I tried to free your mother's spirit, but I failed.
I beg you to finish what I could not. The solution is waiting in our old family home.”
As a son, I must “write” the happy ending for my family’s story.
